IEA2024-Successofstart-ups: This set of indicators will focus on measuring how successful start-ups have been in different countries and sectors.
Country of the start-up in ISO3 format
High-level sector used to group start-ups (including non-energy, energy-and-digital, energy-and-non-digital, energy-and-green, energy-and-not-green) or energy technology field (wind, solar, etcÅc)
percentage of success, IPO or acquisition
